version_description: Small improvements and minor bug fixes

- Minor bug fixes
- Fixed blurry screen which occurred randomly on some devices
- You can now tap on the shower without a character on it
- Performance improvements

Do you love Sweet Home Stories? Please, rate it with 5 stars to help us to develop new amazing games like this!

v1.0.5 -> Minor bug fixes
v1.0.4
- Fixed blurry screen which occurred randomly on some devices
- You can now tap on the shower without a character on it
- Performance improvements

Minor bug fixes.

Comments about Sweet Home Stories? You can write us at hello@playtoddlers.com

- Small improvements
- Fixed "Support" button in Settings Menu

- New, improved and polished User Interface
- LOTS of bug fixes
- Full support for iPhone X devices
This update fixes some issues and improves performance on older devices.

- Added support for newer devices
- Performance improvements
- This update includes some performance improvements and added compatibility with latest iOS devices
